titlestmt.titleproper: Register of the Herbert Solow Papers1924-1976

publicationstmt.p: Hoover Institution Archives. All rights reserved.

profiledesc.creation: Text converted and initial EAD tagging provided by Apex Data Services, May, 1999. Supplementary encoding and revision supplied by James Ryan.

change.item: PUBLIC "-//Stanford University::Hoover Institution Archives//TEXT (US::CSt-H::::Solow, Herbert)//EN" "solowher.sgm" converted from EAD 1.0 to 2002 by v1to02.cdl.xsl (2004-09-16).
Revised to update encoding and add unitid by Jill Golden

titlepage.titleproper: Register of the Herbert Solow Papers1924-1976
titlepage.publisher:
Hoover Institution Archives
Stanford University
Stanford, California
titlepage.p: © 1999 Hoover Institution Archives. All rights reserved.

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.abstract: Correspondence, speeches and writings, memoranda, depositions, clippings, and other printed matter, relating to the communist movement in the United States, the Non-Partisan Defense League, the Commission of Inquiry into the Charges Made Against Leon Trotsky in the Moscow Trials, Soviet espionage in the United States, Whittaker Chambers and the Alger Hiss case, Zionism, the Nuremberg Trial of Major German War Criminals, 1945-1946, and post-World War II international business enterprises. Includes some papers of Sylvia Salmi Solow, 1964-1976

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Herbert Solow Papers [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1977.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

scopecontent.p: Personal documents, college diploma, biographical data, card files, newspaper clippings, and union membership cards, arranged as listed in container list.
Arranged alphabetically by name of correspondent.
Arranged alphabetically by name of correspondent.
Drafts and printed copies, arranged alphabetically by title or subject.
Correspondence, memoranda, reports, lists, notes, printed matter, etc. Arranged alphabetically by either author, title or subject.
